rules_text: Whenever a creature dies for the first time each turn, proliferate. [i](Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“Look past her irony and you'll see gold.”
—Tarese, the World String[/i]
notes: Spells you cast that target an opponent cost 2 less to cast.
